name: Ice Hockey Shootout Classic
description:
Welcome to Ice Hockey Shootout Classic. This is an original hockey shootout game intended for all ages and geared towards kids.

We have recently updated the game and are excited to continue updating. We have all sorts of fun new equipment upgrades, game play modes, backgrounds, and customizers in store for the future. Including a special “super save” or “super shot” skill and bonus rounds where the player or goalie can have a ton of fun in target practice. This is the original version where user can choose between being a player or goaltender. Keep checking back as we have many things planned very soon!!! If you enjoy hockey of all kinds you will love ice hockey shootout!

Ice Hockey Shootout Classic features:

* Audio tracks from amazing new musical artists.
* Sic gear upgrades - Including "HCAP "upgrade
* Shooter or Goalie play modes

Check out the game with attitude, NOW!!!

www.hockeyshootout.wix.com/icehockeyshootout

facebook.com/icehockeyshootout
